attributes.action: Will the government leave the HCR so the government can take back control
attributes.additional_details: So we can take back more control of our laws and not foreign courts rolling on issues our government should and our own courts to make there own decisions. It's the only way to take back control of our own sovereignty
attributes.background: Debate the UK'S  REMOVAL OF THE HRC

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:

Hold a referendum to decide if the UK should leave the ECHR
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700614
